hero.title: Where Design Meets Sustainability
hero.subtitle: Creating functional spaces that combine innovation, elegance, and eco-conscious design for a sustainable future.

about.title: Designing Spaces, Defining
about.description: Eco Homes is a leading architectural and design consultancy based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. We specialize in architecture, interior design, landscape design, and engineering solutions delivering integrated, sustainable designs that reflect culture, functionality, and innovation. From concept to completion, we bring unparalleled creativity and expertise to local projects, creating spaces that inspire and endure.

hero.title: Designing With Passion,
hero.subtitle: Building With Precision
hero.description: At Eco Homes, great design goes beyond aesthetics—it embraces lifestyles, respects nature, and shapes the modern world.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
paragraphs: Eco Homes is a multidisciplinary design and consulting firm based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, specializing in architecture, interior design, landscape design, engineering, and construction.

With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, we create spaces that are functional and timeless. Our projects reflect cultural identity while embracing international expertise through our network of global creative partners.

founder.title: CEO's Message
founder.message: “With a shared vision to create a company built on trust, innovation, and sustainability. As partners, we believe in combining our strengths to deliver projects that not only meet expectations but also inspire and endure.”

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: We design with a clear purpose merging innovation, culture, and sustainability to shape spaces that matter.

values.title: Functionality
values.description: Spaces built for real lifestyles, not just aesthetics.

values.title: Precision
values.description: Attention to detail from concept to execution.

values.title: Culture
values.description: Designs that respect context, tradition, and local identity.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To craft sustainable, innovative, and high-quality design solutions that improve daily living while reducing environmental impact.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the leading design and consulting firm in the region—where architecture, sustainability, and modern living meet.

partner.title: Your Trusted Partner for Sustainable, World-Class Design
partner.description: Choosing Eco Homes means more than hiring a design firm; it's partnering with a team blending creativity, sustainability, and precision engineering.
uniquePoints: Designs Rooted in Sustainability and Innovation
A Global Perspective with Local Cultural Touch
partner.stats: With 200+ projects delivered, we consistently achieve tangible outcomes like 30% energy savings, 40% water conservation, and 50% less construction waste per project.

portfolioSection.title: Our Works
portfolioSection.subtitle: Discover a curated selection of our standout projects that blend innovation, sustainability, and timeless beauty in every detail.

reviews.name: Abdullah Al-Qahtani
reviews.content: Eco Homes transformed our villa into a sustainable, modern sanctuary. Their attention to detail and commitment to eco-friendly design exceeded our expectations.

reviews.name: Salam Al-Dosari
reviews.content: Their designs blend elegance with sustainability—truly elevating the way we live and work.

reviews.name: Fahad
reviews.content: From concept to completion, Eco Homes delivered exceptional service and innovative solutions that perfectly matched our vision.

reviews.name: Nasser Al-Shehri
reviews.content: Working with Eco Homes was a game-changer. Their expertise in sustainable architecture helped us create a home that is both beautiful and environmentally responsible.

reviews.name: Laila
reviews.content: The Eco Homes team brought our dream home to life with their innovative designs and sustainable practices. We couldn't be happier with the results!

footerSection.description: We are experts in comprehensive design and engineering consultancy with cumulative experiences of more than 10 years.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear about your next project.

hero.title:
Bringing Excellence
Across Every
Design Verticals
hero.subtitle: From architectural marvels to sustainable landscapes, we create spaces that harmonize with nature while delivering uncompromising quality and innovation.

sidebar.title: Architecture
sidebar.description: Crafting innovative and functional spaces that reflect cultural heritage, respond to the environment, and elevate everyday living.

sidebar.title: Interior Design
sidebar.description: Creating harmonious interiors that blend aesthetics, comfort, and usability, tailored to enhance the lifestyle and vision of each client.

sidebar.title: Landscape Design
sidebar.description: Designing outdoor environments that connect people with nature, promoting sustainability, biodiversity, and aesthetic appeal.

sidebar.title: Engineering
sidebar.description: Delivering robust, efficient, and future-proof engineering solutions that support architectural integrity and performance.

sidebar.title: Consultation and Supervision
sidebar.description: Providing expert guidance and project oversight to ensure quality, compliance, and seamless execution from concept to completion.

sections.title: Innovative & Sustainable Architecture
sections.text: We design functional buildings that balance culture, climate, and creativity. Our architectural solutions are sustainable, functional, and timelessly crafted to inspire generations.
sections.outcome: Spaces that inspire, adapt to modern lifestyles, and endure with elegance.

sections.title: Elegant Interiors That Elevate Living
sections.text: Creating interior beauty with practicality, tailored to reflect personal identity and functionality while embracing eco-conscious materials and modern aesthetics.
sections.outcome: Interiors that transform everyday living into refined experiences.

sections.title: Green, Serene & Smart Landscapes
sections.text: We create outdoor environments that blend nature and design, enhancing well-being while conserving resources with sustainable strategies and smart systems.
sections.outcome: Serene, resource-efficient spaces that nurture people and the planet.

sections.title: Precision-Driven Engineering
sections.text: Our engineering solutions provide structural integrity, efficiency, and innovation. We ensure every project is reliable, safe, and built for long-term sustainability.
sections.outcome: Future-ready infrastructure that supports modern living.

sections.title: End-to-End Project Consultation
sections.text: We provide expert guidance and supervision from design to delivery, ensuring quality, timeliness, and cost-efficiency in every project.
sections.outcome: Seamless execution and successful project delivery.

sustainability.title:
How Our Verticals Drive
Sustainable Impact
sustainability.text: Each vertical integrates eco-conscious practices, from architecture to engineering, ensuring reduced carbon footprint, enhanced resource efficiency, and sustainable living environments for future generations.

cta.title:
Let's Shape Together
Your Atmosphere
cta.text: Join us to create a landmark, innovative, and sustainably environment that transforms your vision into reality. Let's build something extraordinary together.

hero.title:
Sustainability at the
Heart of
Every Design
hero.subtitle: At Eco Homes, sustainability isn't just an option, it's our foundation.

philosophy.title: Our Sustainability
philosophy.description: We believe great design should elevate lifestyles and protect the planet.
philosophy.alt: Sustainable architecture with green glass ceiling

pillars.title: Green Innovation
pillars.description: Using innovative and recycled materials to reduce environmental impact.

pillars.title: Energy Efficiency
pillars.description: Maximizing natural light, airflow, and renewable energy.

pillars.title: Resource Management
pillars.description: Implementing smart technologies to conserve resources.

pillars.title: Healthy Living
pillars.description: Promoting healthier environments for well-being and comfort.

items.title: Architecture
items.description: Designing buildings with sustainable materials, layouts, and renewable energy.

items.title: Interior Design
items.description: Eco-friendly interior solutions with energy-efficient design.

items.title: Landscape Design
items.description: Outdoor spaces with native plants and water-saving systems.

items.title: Engineering
items.description: Advanced sustainable technologies and building systems.

items.title: Consultation
items.description: Expert guidance on sustainable practices and certifications.

impact.title:

impact.subtitle: Every decision from planning to material selection is rooted in sustainability.

why.title: Why Sustainability Matters to Us
why.description: Sustainability is our responsibility. We create eco-friendly spaces that enhance lifestyles and preserve the planet.

cta.title:
Let's Shape Together
Your Atmosphere
cta.subtitle: Join us to make this world a better place to live.

hero.title: Shape Your Dream
hero.subtitle: Space Together
hero.description: We'd love to hear from you. Whether it's a new home, a commercial project, or landscape design, our team is ready to bring your vision to life.

form.name: Name
form.successMessage: ✅ Thank you! Your message has been sent.
form.errorMessage: ❌ Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
form.disclaimer: By pressing the submit button, I agree to Eco Homes contacting me by email. I also understand that any information I've shared in this form is subject to Eco Homes privacy policy.

hero.title:
Designing Sustainable
Spaces
hero.subtitle: That Inspire
hero.description: Every project tells a story of innovation, sustainability, and design excellence. We create spaces that not only inspire but also respect our environment.

overview.title: Portfolio Overview
overview.description: At Eco Homes, our portfolio reflects 200+ successful projects across diverse sectors. Each design blends sustainability, cultural relevance, and modern innovation resulting in spaces that are functional, timeless, and environmentally conscious.

impact.title: Our Impact in
impact.subtitle: Numbers
impact.description: We believe great design should not only create beautiful but also protect our planet. That's why every decision from planning to material selection is rooted in sustainability.

cta.title: Your Vision,
cta.subtitle: Our Design
cta.description: Explore how Eco Homes can bring your dream project to life. Whether it's sustainability, innovation or beauty.

carousel.sectionDescription: We create homes that balance comfort, luxury, and eco-consciousness. From modern villas to high-rise residences, our designs redefine sustainable living.
